name: Rehuenited
description:
This is a 15 second microgame created for GDA's second annual Microgame Jam.  Hop from paint pool to paint pool to reunite with your partner!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys for movement
  • Space Bar to jump

Credits:

  • Design: Ashley Wrenn, Em Coo, Dylan "marigold" Mahler
  • Art: Ashley Wrenn, Em Coo
  • Programming/Sound: Dylan "marigold" Mahler
  • Voice Acting: Ashley Wrenn
  • Catering: Ashley Wrenn
  • Lodging: Ashley Wrenn, Julia Persson
